mobileAppsData.description: Save web pages as PDF files on your webOS device for offline reading. And if the file is too big, you can download in grayscale and low quality.
mobileAppsData.title: PDFMyWeb Pro

mobileAppsData.description: Access, edit, delete, search, and add to your Google bookmarks on your phone. Sync bookmarks between multiple computers and your Palm device using Google toolbar and Gmarks.
mobileAppsData.title: Gmarks

mobileAppsData.description: Find great new apps with Leaderboard. See the most-downloaded and highest-earning webOS apps as well as the Fastest Movers list, which shows the newest apps shooting up the ranks.
mobileAppsData.title: Leaderboard

mobileAppsData.description: Get a customizable, functional, and flexible timer application. It’s easy to pause, resume, stop, start, and reset the countdown.
mobileAppsData.title: T Minus

mobileAppsData.description: Supersize your phone’s storage by installing ZumoDrive on your computer. It makes everything on your Mac or PC available to you on your phone—access all your music, photos, files, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: ZumoDrive

mobileAppsData.description: Jot down notes, ideas, and errands as you go. Easily set any note as a reminder and BugMe! will sound an alarm and pop up an alert when it’s due.
mobileAppsData.title: BugMe! Notes and Reminders

mobileAppsData.description: Use Scratchpad to take down important notes for later. You won’t lose anything among dozens of different memos—it’s simple, effective, and free.
mobileAppsData.title: Scratchpad

mobileAppsData.description: Seamlessly take notes and add images, video, or audio clips to them. You can categorize, search, or share your notes, or add a pin code to protect them from unwanted viewers.
mobileAppsData.title: Notes

mobileAppsData.description: Save notes, tasks, or longer prose in this simple and elegant app. Dark or light themes, multiple fonts and font sizes, and a full-screen reading mode let you focus on what matters: your text.
mobileAppsData.title: TapNote

mobileAppsData.description: Remember your latest notes, ideas, thoughts, and errands with the help of Jot It. The app saves automatically and can email you a copy of new notes when you complete them.
mobileAppsData.title: Jot It

mobileAppsData.description: Discover great apps with the help of this app from Palm. Each week we highlight some of our favorite apps from the catalog. For the full list of available titles, please visit the App Catalog on your phone.
mobileAppsData.title: Featured Apps

mobileAppsData.description: Capture notes, to-dos, business cards, wine labels, and more. Synchronize what you capture across your computer and phone, then find it later using Evernote's search feature.
mobileAppsData.title: Evernote

mobileAppsData.description: Stay on task wherever you are by setting location-based reminders that alert you when you're close to a location where you need to perform a task.
mobileAppsData.title: GeoStrings

mobileAppsData.description: Get a simple and efficient way to manage your tasks. Color-coding makes it easy to tell when items are due, and when you're done with something, just swipe it off the list.
mobileAppsData.title: ToDo Classic

mobileAppsData.description: Got a great idea for a fun, cool, or useful app? Submit it to the App Idea Box, or vote on the ideas of others and read developer feedback.
mobileAppsData.title: App Idea Box

mobileAppsData.description: Put all those details so often forgotten right at your fingertips. Organize work projects, plan a move, or make a grocery list. The dynamic to-do list shows only the tasks you need.
mobileAppsData.title: Outline Tracker Free

mobileAppsData.description: Run PalmOS<sup>®</sup> apps on your new Palm webOS phone. With Classic by MotionApps, longtime Palm OS users as well as new webOS enthusiasts can get the best of both worlds.<sup>2</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: Classic

mobileAppsData.description: Transfer information between your desktop Microsoft<sup>®</sup> Office Outlook<sup>®</sup> Contacts and Calendar and the apps on your phone using complete two-way synchronization.
mobileAppsData.title: PocketMirror

mobileAppsData.description: Synchronize your Palm Desktop Date Book and Address Book with your webOS Calendar and Contacts using 256-bit Blowfish encryption over Wi-Fi.
mobileAppsData.title: Echo

mobileAppsData.description: Call the people you talk with the most—just by tapping their picture. Easily add your favorite numbers and display them in either grid or list views.<sup>3</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: PhotoDialer

mobileAppsData.description: Store confidential information like usernames, passwords, bank accounts, credit cards, and prescriptions more securely, and keep it close at hand.
mobileAppsData.title: SplashID

mobileAppsData.description: Transfer and sync contacts from a Mac to your Palm webOS phone. The Missing Sync by Mark/Space also synchronizes your information wirelessly using Wi-Fi.<sup>4</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: The Missing Sync

mobileAppsData.description: Store frequently used text items like notes, usernames, and passwords. Then copy and paste them into Palm webOS apps whenever you want. Insert dates, times, and variables, too.
mobileAppsData.title: P2Snippets

mobileAppsData.description: Keep your information secure by generating random passwords. Use letters, numbers, or symbols, and easily copy them to the clipboard for use in other apps.
mobileAppsData.title: Uber Pass

mobileAppsData.description: Keep track of how much time you spend on projects, tasks, clients, habits, or any other activity. Be even more productive and track multiple projects simultaneously with customized reminders.
mobileAppsData.title: Time Spent

mobileAppsData.description: Create a list of items to purchase and check them off as you pick up what you need. The app keeps a history of items you've added so you don't have to enter them every time you need them.
mobileAppsData.title: Grocery List

mobileAppsData.description: Never forget an important thought again. Note to Self allows you to quickly jot something down and send it to any email address without having to open Email.
mobileAppsData.title: Note to Self

mobileAppsData.description: Search up to four sites at once and find answers fast. Quick Search searches Dictionary.com, Amazon, Bing, Yahoo!, Google, CNN, and many more.
mobileAppsData.title: Quick Search

mobileAppsData.description: Create and customize shopping lists and carry them with you for easy reference. Make template lists for items you buy frequently, and quickly send lists via email or SMS.
mobileAppsData.title: Shopping List

mobileAppsData.description: Your phone has a built-in time alarm—now you can add another dimension with a space alarm. Set the alarm for a predefined destination and the app alerts you when you are close.
mobileAppsData.title: Space Alarm

mobileAppsData.description: Expense reports made easy—just enter your cash transactions and photograph your receipts, then upload them to Expensify.com to get eReceipts and send reports to any email address.
mobileAppsData.title: Expensify - Expense Reports

mobileAppsData.description: Record your working time, associate it with projects, and annotate it with comments. You can display your data in various charts or email a detailed spreadsheet of your hours.
mobileAppsData.title: TimeTracker

mobileAppsData.description: Get a fully functional rich text editor designed specifically for Palm webOS. You can create, edit, and save notes or memos with bold, underlined, or italicized text.
mobileAppsData.title: textPress!

footnotes.text: 2. Seven-day free trial available from developer's website.  Purchase required after trial period expires. Not all Palm applications supported.
3. Compatible with Palm webOS version 1.1 or higher only.
4. Requires The Missing Sync for the Palm webOS (for Mac or Windows), sold separately.
